Once you have received your number, you may log into your account by going to http://phone.ipkall.com/login.asp and logging in with your IPKall phone number (10 digit number only, no spaces or dashes) and the password you provided. If you would like to cancel your account, log into you account and choose the Cancel Account link.

IPKall is a PSTN to Existing VoIP service ONLY; devices and/or software are not to be logged into IPKall servers. IPKall reserves the right to refuse or terminate service for any reason. Accounts that are inactive for 30 days will be terminated for non-use.

IPKall does not provide customer service. Get help from other users by joining the discussion threads in the FREE online forum dedicated to Q&A on IPKall.

IF you are interested in having a toll free number ring to the number you receive here, or any phone number, check out Kall8.To have a toll free number ring to you IP phone, all you need to do is sign up for this service, receive your IPKall phone number, sign up for Kall8, and set your ring-to number to your new IPKall phone number. Special Kall8 rates will apply.
